templates.title: Jamming Bot (Production)
templates.description: Complete jamming bot application with Flask backend, Redis, PostgreSQL, microservices, and Nginx reverse proxy
templates.note: Production deployment with all services: bot, Flask API, workers, databases, nginx, SSL certificates, and monitoring. Includes resource limits and optimization.

env.description: Secret key for Flask application security (required)

env.name: DOMAIN_NAME
env.label: Domain Name
env.description: Your domain name for SSL certificates (optional)

env.name: EMAIL
env.label: Email for SSL
env.description: Email address for Let's Encrypt SSL certificates
